description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9lneu","text":"This protocol describe the treatment of human enteroendocrine cell models Hutu80 and NCI h716 parental cells with SCFAs and GCase inhibitor (CBE) in order to detect the impact of SCFAs and GCAse inhibition on alpha synuclein protein expression by immunoblotting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"c2l9q","text":"Cell lysis buffer :  Tris HCl pH 8.0 50 mM, EDTA 5 mM, NaCl 200 mM, Glycerol 10%, Igepal/NP40 0.5%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cg91","text":"Protease inhibitor : Pierce‱ Protease Inhibitor Tablets (Thermofisher)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5c8g2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"p24b","text":"Laemmeli buffer : 125 mm Tris-HCl [pH 6.8], 4% SDS, 20% glycerol, 100 mm dithiothreitol [DTT], 0.02% bromophenol blue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u26k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pd14","text":"Migration Buffer :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tmgs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bak2t","text":"Transfert Buffer : ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3EA9882DABCB11EE819C0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"595ir","text":"Hutu80 and NCI h716 parental cells were seeded in wells at a density of 1.0 105 cells the day before treatments and incubated at    in a 5% CO2 atmosphere","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":78,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":142,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":129,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6o5g5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75n4v","text":"Cells were treated with differents concentrations ( 0.5 ; 1 ; 2 ; 4 and 6 mM) of SCFAs Acetate, propionate and butyrate (100 mM stock solutions in water (SIGMA-ALDRICH)) and with or not CBE  10 uM (Cyaman chemical) for differents time of incubation ( 2h ; 6h ; 24h and 48h). For CBE treaments, cells were pre-incubated with 10 uM CBE for    and then incubated with SCFAs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":338,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bi08q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgmov","text":"Cells were lysed in lysis buffer containing protease inhibitors (see materials) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ebjm","text":"-For HuTu80 cells lysis (Adherent cells):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6307h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ukal","text":"Carefully remove culture medium and wash cells 2 times with cold PBS.  Add 100 uL of cold lysis buffer to the cells.  Keep on ice for   , stirring the plate occasionally for uniform spreading.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":134,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1qt1e","text":"Collect the lysate on one side using a cell scraper, collect the lysate and transfer it to a microcentrifuge tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1olr2","text":"Discard supernatant and wash cells twice in cold PBS. Collect cells by centrifugation at    for   . pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":90,"length":1},{"key":7,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9i0u7","text":"Centrifuge the mixture at     for    to sediment cell {"blocks":[{"key":"4dg5o","text":"Electrophoresis and transfer : ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5rsd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86mgv","text":"Separate samples (~ 10 ug total protein)  by polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis using precast TGX Stain-free pre-cast SDS-polyacrylamide gel (Bio-rad)and migration buffer (see materials) at 200 V      or until dye front reaches the bottom of the gel. Run with pre-stained size markers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":196,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d06mn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"arfba","text":"Proteins were then transferred using liquid transfer on PVDF membranes (Bio-rad). PVDF membrane should be imbibed in EtOH 100% and equilibrate with transfer buffer (see materials) before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6nbr7","text":"Soak transfer sandwich components (4 sheets of filter paper and 5 blotting pads) in transfer buffer and assemble in the transfer cassette in the following order:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3vq45","text":"Starting with the cathode plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qfuv","text":"1 x blotting pads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dun8b","text":"2 x filter paper","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6o0it","text":"gel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0qf8","text":"PVDF","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fetjs","text":"2 x filter paper","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nr00","text":"1 x pad ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebcbk","text":"Use a rollerin every step in order to eliminate air bubbles","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3851d","text":"Place cassette and a cooling unit in transfer tank placed in glace and transfer protein 100V    in transfer buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":93,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8jee2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
